incidents.name: RESOLVED: Live Sites Not Loading For Some of Sky Broadband Users In UK

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We stopped receiving complaints regarding this matter. In case you are still experiencing the issue, please reach out to Sky's support team directly for assistance.
We are continuing to investigate on our side. In the meantime, please make sure to contact Sky's support team directly for assistance.

We've received reports that some users on Sky Broadband in UK are having trouble loading Wix sites. The issue appears to be with the internet service provider itself, not with Wix.

While we investigate, we recommend contacting Sky's support team directly for assistance. You can also try switching to a different internet connection, such as your mobile phone's data, to access your site.

incidents.name: Periodical Issues With Site Access From Some Internet Providers in Brazil

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

We're aware of an issue with accessing Wix sites for some visitors from Brazil.

We have done an extensive investigation and found the issue to be caused by the routing path between a client's ISP (Internet service provider) and Wix before it reaches Wix's infrastructure. As such, it is not possible for us to resolve it on our end.

In case you encounter this issue, please contact your ISP directly as their customer in order for them to address and resolve the issue

As a possible workaround, please attempt to access the site by typing www. or the full domain with https://

Please keep in mind that the workaround does not work for everyone.

We're aware of an issue with accessing Wix sites for some visitors from Brazil.

We have done an extensive investigation and found the issue to be caused by the routing path between a client's ISP (Internet service provider) and Wix before it reaches Wix's infrastructure. As such, it is not possible for us to resolve it on our end.

In case you encounter this issue, please contact your ISP directly as their customer in order for them to address and resolve the issue.

incidents.name: RESOLVED: Some Wix Websites May Be Unaccessible in Brazil

incident_updates.body:
The site loading issue affecting users in Brazil is now resolved. Sites are now loading normally.

The issue was related to external network conditions with third-party Latin American ISP providers. We have done an extensive investigation and found the issue to be caused by the routing before it reaches Wix. 

No further action is required. We will continue monitoring to ensure stability.

We’re aware of an issue that appears to manifest on the routing path between a user's Internet Provider and Wix for some users trying to access Wix sites from Brazil. 

We have done an extensive investigation and found the issue to be caused by the routing before it reaches Wix.

In case you encounter this issue, please contact your Internet Provider directly and ask them to perform a trace to see where the connection stops and they can address it from there.

As a possible workaround, please attempt to access the site by typing www. or the full domain with https://

Please keep in mind that the workaround does not work for everyone.

We’re aware of an issue that appears to manifest on the routing path between a user's Internet Provider and Wix for some users trying to access Wix sites from Brazil.

In case you encounter this issue, please contact your Internet Provider directly in order for them to take measures on their side. 

As a workaround, please attempt toaccess the site by typing www. or the full domain with https://

We are monitoring their progress and will provide an update once we see the issue is resolved.

incidents.name: RESOLVED: We are experiencing issues with our Customer Support Call Center. Chats are currently closed and longer wait times are expected.

incident_updates.body:
Reports of issues with calls connecting to our Call Center respresentatives started at roughly 12PM US Central time.

Around the same time, issues starting affecting Chats as well.

Our team pushed out a full fix at 2PM US Central time and our Customer Support Call Center resumed full operations.
This incident has been resolved.
We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

incidents.name: RESOLVED: Some Live Sites Loading Blank

incident_updates.body:
This incident has been resolved.

Some Wix live sites experienced issues loading or displayed a blank white screen due to a failure in our internal cache layer in one of our regions. 
Unfortunately, Wix's automatic traffic switchover mechanism did not function as expected, leading to a delay in resolution. 
The issue was ultimately resolved by redirecting traffic to an alternate region. 

We have fixed the automatic failover mechanism and enhanced our internal operational runbooks to better address such incidents in the future.
We appreciate your patience as our engineers continue to work on the issue.
Our engineers are currently investigating an issue affecting live sites not loading
